Title: Bed Bugs and Beyond
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Jim Danger Gray, Piper Kerman (book), Jordan Harrison (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: Tempers flare when bed bugs invade, as Alex cracks, Red lashes out at Piper, Aleida interferes with Daya and Bennett, and Caputo gets bad news.
